channel.title: 1.6 info, read now
channel.description:
This upgrade was a huge pain in the ass, all sorts of horrible stuff happened, and in the end, everyone will spawn at the spawn, and not where they last were, and I can't do anything about it.
So I have enabled the /home command temporarily, probably for 2 or 3 days, so that people can get home, then it will be disabled again.
Other than that, post any issues you have here.

item.title: 1.6 info, read now
item.dc:creator: @badger41 badger41
item.description:
@badger41 wrote:

Fix or remove whatever nether plugin you have, its conflicting with the current nether for 1.6 and i get spawned in a missing chunk every single time and i cant do anything

Also i cant place blocks because our nether portal happens to spawn us within the spawning area of the nether, i can break blocks but i cant place them.

Read full topic
